Title: Episode #1.2
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Joe Penhall
Actors: Sonny Valicenti, Gary Warden, Holt McCallany, Jonathan Groff
Plot: Holden interviews the eerily articulate murderer Ed Kemper, but his research provokes negative feedback at the Bureau.
